Test Name: TP53 Somatic Mutation, DNA Sequencing Exons 4-9
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from patient hematologic neoplasm samples
Purpose: Detection of somatic mutations in TP53 exons 4-9 for patients with hematologic neoplasms.
Equipment: Thermal cycler, DNA sequencer (e.g., ABI 3130XL), centrifuge, gel electrophoresis apparatus, sequence-analysis software
